snippet.title: The Zone: Stalker Stories SGF Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299540/The_Zone_Stalker_Stories/

This is the Zone -- a post-apocalyptic world where strangeness and confusion are the norm, filled with treasure, danger, exploration and strategic card battles.

Narrative deckbuilder, RPG, visual novel, and more.

Coming Soon on Steam!
